Node.definition: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to hew out|to dig|to cut out|to dress|to mine
Node.definition: = action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or other sharp implement, ► in order to alter its shape and so create a new object out of it
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= causative action by which humans kill an animal by slicing the jugular vein and windpipe with a sharp bladed instrument ► to prepare its meat for a meal; ≈ associated with aggression
= causative action by which humans kill animals by slicing the jugular vein and windpipe with a sharp bladed instrument, ► to prepare its meat for a meal; ≈ associated with aggression
= action by which humans mix different ingredients into a single substance

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

literally: something that has been spread out; hence: = a flat surface on which food has been spread out for eating ◄ usually made of wood but can be a piece of animal skin or leather ► used in private and public occasions, and frequently for sacred uses in the tabernacle and temple
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= the highest point of a place
= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall; ≈ poetic term

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions; ◄ because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience
= state in which humans lack a particular quality that they are supposed to have
literally: heart; hence: = the ability to think for oneself as opposed to being easily swayed by what others say or do

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which humans ingest food
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= action by which humans mix different ingredients into a single substance
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions; ◄ because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to follow the way (of)|to act (with, as)
Node.definition: literally: to go forward on a road; hence: = to behave in a certain way
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution
= someone who shows contempt for other people and ideas
= state which provokes disdain from the general public or from a specific category of people ◄ due to one's behavior or condition
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
= state in which humans or animals have a physical defect on their body
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
= someone who shows contempt for other people and ideas
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.gloss: to be able|to be skillful|to be wise|to be intelligent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans, deities, and animals possess or gain a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
literally: to add; hence: = process by which a certain quality of humans increases in intensity, either in actual fact or in the eyes of others

= causative action by which humans and deities give verbal instruction to other humans, and by which the focus is on the communication of the message rather than the content of the message; ≈ often connoting persuasive or eloquent speech
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: knowing (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

Node.gloss: years are added (to one's) life|to live a long time
Node.definition: literally: years are added (to one's) life; hence: = process by which humans are allowed to live longer than expected

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to be able|to be skillful|to be wise|to be intelligent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans, deities, and animals possess or gain a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.gloss: to be able|to be skillful|to be wise|to be intelligent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans, deities, and animals possess or gain a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= someone who shows contempt for other people and ideas
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
literally: to hold; hence: = process by which humans are held responsible for a certain action or for the well being of others
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state of absence of wisdom, ◄ possible due to overconfidence, ► which manifests itself in immoral behavior

Node.gloss: to be in tumult|to be in uproar|to be loud
Node.definition: = action by which humans speak loudly, ≈ often associated with a lack of wisdom
= state of being easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions; ◄ because of one's lack of wisdom and experience
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth
= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall; ≈ poetic term
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: to make straight one's way > to walk straight ahead
Node.definition: literally: to make one's way straight; = action by which humans move forward without deviating to the right or to the left; ≈ with the possible connotation of minding one's own affairs
= the course that one follows, whether it is on an actual road or path or not

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions; ◄ because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience
= state in which humans lack a particular quality that they are supposed to have
literally: heart; hence: = the ability to think for oneself as opposed to being easily swayed by what others say or do

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= state in which food tastes well
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= state in which knowledge, an object, or an action is kept hidden or unknown from others

Node.gloss: to be lovely|to be pleasant|to be sweet|to be dear
Node.definition: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
